column2: Imperial traders and citizens have vanished with some last seen heading to the village Gipfel. Witch Hunters dispatched by Volkmar have reported to us that the place reeks of Chaos. The village leader Dagobert Heathland ensures us however this is merely an imperial ploy to sabotage our industry.
The Mootland economy thrives, though folks look a little paler than usually.
Gipfel is ruined and the effects reverberate throughout the Moot.
